name: glucosylceramidase
classes: Glycosidases, i.e. enzymes that hydrolyse O- and S-glycosyl compounds
reaction: a D-glucosyl-N-acylsphingosine + H2O = D-glucose + a ceramide [RN:R01498]
comment: Also acts on glucosylsphingosine (cf. EC 3.2.1.62 glycosylceramidase).

references.title: THE METABOLISM OF GLUCOCEREBROSIDES. I. PURIFICATION AND PROPERTIES OF A GLUCOCEREBROSIDE-CLEAVING ENZYME FROM SPLEEN TISSUE.
Characterization of human glucosylsphingosine glucosyl hydrolase and comparison with glucosylceramidase.
